Full night time closures Monday - Thursday from 7:30 PM - 6:30 AM. Single lane alternating traffic with 10' width restriction, no vehicles over 70 feet length, and no haz-mat from 6:30 AM - 7:30 PM, Monday-Friday. Fully open to two-way traffic with no delays from Friday at 7:30 PM – to Monday at 6:30 AM. For further information, visit us50info.com
